bibliography.[Guidance]: [Guidance] consists of three documents: (1) NXP eDoc Suite v3.5 on JCOP4 - cryptovision ePasslet Suite – Java Card Applet Suite providing Electronic ID Documents applications. Guidance Manual. Document Version 1.3.1, 2020-11-30. (2) NXP eDoc Suite v3.5 on JCOP4 - cryptovision ePasslet Suite – Java Card applet configuration providing an ICAO MRTD application with Extended Access Control (EACv1) or with Basic Access Control (BAC) and Supplemental Access Control (SAC) -Preparation Guidance (AGD_PRE). Document Version 1.3.1, 2020-11-30. (3) NXP eDoc Suite v3.5 on JCOP4 - cryptovision ePasslet Suite – Java Card applet configuration providing an ICAO MRTD application with Extended Access Control (EACv1) or with Basic Access Control (BAC) and Supplemental Access Control (SAC) -Operational Guidance (AGD_OPE). Document Version 1.2.0, 2020-11-24.
